about_the_game:
Dodging slow-motion shots and shooting back is really cool. And we missed a top-down game that way. The desire to play something like this motivated us to create SuperOffice.

In SuperOffice you are Ana, a special agent that received the mission to investigate a series of alien signal emissions. But during your mission, a mysterious creature gave you the power to control time, and now you are able to collect more alien powers and use all of them in your journey.

Aliens and monsters are everywhere chasing you. To clean up this mess you will need to use your power, skill and any weapon you find along the way, like guns, swords and even vases to throw at your enemies.

In addition to the action, time control and a lot of weapons, SuperOffice also features bosses - the star captains. Each one has a special power, and getting them allows you to become even more powerful.



  • Infinite rooms: Dive into sequences of procedural generated rooms leading to the star captains.
  • Power collecting: Defeat the star captains and get their powers. You already got the power of time - what other powers may exist?
  • Many weapons: From pistols, shotguns, machine guns, swords, knives to vases, computer monitors and your own fists.
  • Office environment: Tired of your work? Destroy monitors, work desks and report boxes - all in your time.

Please feel free to ask us anything or give suggestions at support@growingseedgames.com.

About the Game

Dodging slow-motion shots and shooting back is really cool. And we missed a top-down game that way. The desire to play something like this motivated us to create SuperOffice.

In SuperOffice you are Ana, a special agent that received the mission to investigate a series of alien signal emissions. But during your mission, a mysterious creature gave you the power to control time, and now you are able to collect more alien powers and use all of them in your journey.

Aliens and monsters are everywhere chasing you. To clean up this mess you will need to use your power, skill and any weapon you find along the way, like guns, swords and even vases to throw at your enemies.

In addition to the action, time control and a lot of weapons, SuperOffice also features bosses - the star captains. Each one has a special power, and getting them allows you to become even more powerful.



  • Infinite rooms: Dive into sequences of procedural generated rooms leading to the star captains.
  • Power collecting: Defeat the star captains and get their powers. You already got the power of time - what other powers may exist?
  • Many weapons: From pistols, shotguns, machine guns, swords, knives to vases, computer monitors and your own fists.
  • Office environment: Tired of your work? Destroy monitors, work desks and report boxes - all in your time.

Please feel free to ask us anything or give suggestions at support@growingseedgames.com.
name: SuperOffice

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel x86 family
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: SuperOffice is an intense top down view shooter experience where time moves only when you move.
